text: Sunshine is a 1999 Hungarian German Austrian Canadian French American British romantic drama movie directed by István Szabó and starring Ralph Fiennes, Rosemary Harris, Rachel Weisz, Jennifer Ehle, Molly Parker, Miriam Margolyes, Mark Strong, Bill Paterson, Trevor Peacock, William Hurt, Mari Törőcsik, Péter Andorai, András Stohl. ==Other websites== * Category:1999 romantic drama movies Category:1990s epic movies Category:1990s historical movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:German romance movies Category:German drama movies Category:Austrian romance movies Category:Austrian drama movies Category:Canadian romance movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by István Szabó Category:Movies set in Hungary Category:Movies set in the 19th century
title: Sunshine (1999 movie)
